meta.content: The Maroa-Forsyth School District provides a high-quality public school experience for students from pre-K through 12th grade. Our mission is to provide opportunities for students to fulfill their educational goals in a safe, challenging, and caring environment.

Cultivating a Passion for Learning Maroa-Forsyth provides relevant, challenging, and engaging educational experiences so all students can reach their unique potential. Learn more
Welcome to Maroa-Forsyth School District
Supported by highly skilled and dedicated staff, Maroa-Forsyth School District provides a safe and respectful public school experience for students from pre-K through 12th grade. Our mission is cultivate a passion for learning by challenging all students to reach their unique potential by providing relevant, challenging and engaging education experiences.
In The News
Follow the latest Maroa Forsyth School District news, alerts and social happenings.

Activities
From fine arts to academic teams, Maroa-Forsyth's extracurricular activities set us apart from other school districts.
Academics
Maroa-Forsyth School District curriculum sets high standards for students to help prepare them for success as adults.
Athletics
Win after win, Maroa-Forsyth's competitive Trojan teams bring excitement to our dedicated fans.
